subscription-expired-callout: Your subscription has expired and you no longer have access to your data. <2>Click here to re-activate it.</2>

profile.email-changed: An e-mail has been sent to you with a link to verify your new e-mail address
profile.disconnect-confirm-text: Are you sure that you want to disconnect {{name}}? You will no longer be able to use this integration.

services.facebook-description: Allows you to log in through your Facebook account, one less password to keep track of.
services.google-description: Allows you to log in through your Google account, one less password to keep track of.
services.search-console-description: Import keywords and other data directly from Google Search Console to Wincher.

notifications.ranking-successes-description: Get notified when your website increases in position.
notifications.ranking-summary-description: Get a weekly summary for your starred and other important keywords.
notifications.ranking-warnings-description: Get notified when your website loses its position to a competitor.
notifications.billing-description: Get copies of receipts and invoices to your e-mail.
notifications.news-and-updates-description: Get notified about our latests news and updates.

users.owner-description: Has full access to all projects, can invite and manage all types of users and can manage the account‘s plan and billing.
users.admin-description: Has full access to all projects and data and can invite and manage project members and external users.
users.member-description: Has access to view and manage websites in assigned projects.
users.external-description: Has access to view websites in assigned projects.

starting-page.heading:
Feeling lonely?
Let’s change that
starting-page.subheading: Did you know you can add users to your account and assign them to specific projects?

users.delete-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this user from your account?

modal.subheader: The invitee will receive an e-mail with instructions.

users.roles-warning-description: This user is not currently able to use Wincher since your account no longer has access to the user‘s role. You need to upgrade your account or promote the user.
users.projects-warning-description: This user has no assigned projects which means they won't be able to view any data. You should either assign a project or promote the user.
users.permissions-warning-description: This user has assigned projects but you have don‘t have access to that feature. You need to upgrade your account or promote the user.

payment.title: Payment methods
payment.remove-payment-method-confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this payment method from your account?
payment.error-toast: Something went wrong when adding your payment method, please contact support.
payment.success-toast: Your payment method was added successfully.
payment.no-results: You do not have any saved payment methods.

history.title: Billing history
history.no-results: You do not have any billing history.

upgrade.no-subscription: Sorry, you don’t have a subscription

reactivate-account.heading:
Your data is still here
if you need it.
reactivate-account.subheading: You can reactivate your account at any time and get full access to all your previous data.

personal-access-tokens.description: Personal access tokens are used to access the <1>Wincher REST API</1> programatically. You should generate a personal access token for each application that needs to access to the API. A personal access token grants access to act on your behalf and should be guarded as highly as your password.

create.heading: Create personal access token
create.success-callout:
Successfully created token: <1>{{token}}</1>
Make sure you save it since you won‘t be able to access it again!

table.title: Active personal access tokens
table.revoke-confirm: Are you sure that you want to revoke this personal access token?
